backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and per‑user manga CRUD storage with blob support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI layout requirements and associated files for Add Manga dialog and regression checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, profile setup gating, and rendering the manga list page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users for their name and saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App‑wide layout with header, login/logout control, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist verifying Add Manga dialog height constraints and scrolling behavior across viewport sizes.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog component for adding a new manga entry, managing form state, validation, genre selection, and submission via backend actor.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Input field for adding, uploading, previewing, and removing cover images using ExternalBlob instances with progress tracking.
Displays a compact manga card showing cover, title, rating, chapter progress, completion status, and genres.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main page for viewing paginated manga entries with loading/error states, add-manga dialog, and retry handling for backend connection.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Renders numeric pagination buttons with ellipsis logic and previous/next navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection-state tracking, retry logic, and error reporting for backend availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries from the backend actor when available and authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Queries and saves the current user's profile using the backend actor, with cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Computes a unique sorted list of manga genres from all entries using a memoized transformation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, and deleting manga entries while invalidating related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Fetches a specific manga page via the backend actor, enabled only when identity and actor are ready.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, theme overrides, and utility classes including gold-themed effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and feature requests for an Internet Computer dapp with a manga library.
